mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.stockinfoId as stockinfoId, a.walletId as walletId, a.walletName as walletName, a.walletUsageType as walletUsageType, a.sign as sign, a.randomKey as randomKey, a.remark as remark, a.createBy as createBy, a.createDate as createDate

a.id as id, a.stockinfoId as stockinfoId, a.walletId as walletId, a.walletName as walletName, a.walletUsageType as walletUsageType, a.sign as sign, a.randomKey as randomKey, a.remark as remark, a.createBy as createBy, a.createDate as createDate, b.stockCode as stockCode, b.stockName as stockName
mapper.insert: insert into SystemWalletERC20( id , stockinfoId , walletId , walletName , walletUsageType , sign , randomKey , remark , createBy , createDate ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{stockinfoId} , #{walletId} , #{walletName} , #{walletUsageType} , #{sign} , #{randomKey} , #{remark} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} )
mapper.update: update SystemWalletERC20 set delFlag = 1 where id = #{id}

stockinfoId = #{stockinfoId} ,

walletUsageType = #{walletUsageType} ,

mapper.insert:
insert into SystemWalletERC20( id , stockinfoId , walletId , walletName , walletUsageType , sign , randomKey , remark , createBy , createDate )
select #{item.id} , #{item.stockinfoId} , #{item.walletId} , #{item.walletName} , #{item.walletUsageType} , #{item.sign} , #{item.randomKey} , #{item.remark} , #{item.createBy} , #{item.createDate} from dual

update.foreach: update SystemWalletERC20 set stockinfoId = #{item.stockinfoId} , walletId = #{item.walletId} , walletName = #{item.walletName} , walletUsageType = #{item.walletUsageType} , sign = #{item.sign} , randomKey = #{item.randomKey} , remark = #{item.remark} , createBy = #{item.createBy} , createDate = #{item.createDate} where id = #{item.id}

mapper.update: update SystemWalletERC20 set stockinfoId = #{stockinfoId} , walletId = #{walletId} , walletName = #{walletName} , walletUsageType = #{walletUsageType} , sign = #{sign} , randomKey = #{randomKey} , remark = #{remark} , createBy = #{createBy} , createDate = #{createDate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from SystemWalletERC20 a where a.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM SystemWalletERC20 a ,Stockinfo b WHERE 1=1 and a.stockinfoId = b.id
and a.stockinfoId = #{stockinfoId}
and a.walletId like '%'||#{walletId}||'%'
and a.walletName like '%'||#{walletName}||'%'
and a.walletUsageType like '%'||#{walletUsageType}||'%'
and a.sign like '%'||#{sign}||'%'
and a.randomKey like '%'||#{randomKey}||'%'
and a.remark like '%'||#{remark}||'%'
and a.createBy = #{createBy}
and a.createDate = #{createDate}
